step_feedback.feedback: Good job sitting or standing comfortably. Keep your hands on your abdomen for the next step.
You are placing your hands correctly. Prepare to inhale slowly through your nose and tighten your muscles.
Excellent inhale and muscle tightening! Visualize the fluid moving to your chest as instructed.
Well done exhaling and relaxing your muscles. Visualize pushing fluid out.
Great start to your second repetition. Remember to keep your hands on your abdomen.
Hands are well-placed. Focus on inhaling through your nose and tightening your whole body.
Fantastic inhale and muscle engagement! Keep visualizing the fluid moving towards your chest.
Perfect exhale and relaxation. You're doing great visualizing the fluid movement.

exercise_summary: You did a great job with the deep breathing exercises! You consistently followed the instructions to inhale deeply while tightening your muscles and exhale while relaxing. Keep up this excellent practice to help stimulate lymphatic drainage and improve healing.
